channel.title: A server/client problem
channel.description: I really didnt know where to put this so I put it here lol. No matter what server or client i is even if there from the same person EVERY TIME I click once and move its fine then when I click again my client just shuts down. And on my server it says ive been disconnected. I wanna play some of the servers I download so please help me. Any solutions?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2009, 04:48:50 pm[/size][hr]Nobody can help me out here? Please I would love to play in my server to test it out for more than 3 secconds :/[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2009, 09:49:55 pm[/size][hr]Noone huh well poo i really wanted to play :/

item.title: A server/client problem
